界面是Minecraft怎么修改

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
打开\.minecraft\versions\1.6.2\1.6.2.jar
右键用压缩包打开jar文件
打开\assets\minecraft\textures\gui\title
修改里面的minecraft.png即可
